thread.title: Trump says it's possible summit with North Korea's Kim won't happen

title: Trump says it's possible summit with North Korea's Kim won't happen
text:
Trump says it's possible summit with North Korea's Kim won't happen Tuesday, April 17, 2018 - 01:06 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he hopes to hold a summit meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and that five locations are being considered, but that it remains possible such a meeting may not happen. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
